name: Color Flow - Piano Game
description:
Enjoy the new relaxing piano game.

A latest addictive music game! Let’s install COLOR FLOW and enjoy the simple gameplay to relax with the trending music genre: EDM, Deep-house, Trap, R&B, Pop, Rock...and more!

MAIN FEATURES:
* Popular music sound-track.
* Easy gameplay and quick fitting.
* Game designed in 3D with cute graphics.
* Challenging your skill.
